options.command: pnpm --filter docs-md exec typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out api/ts/web-editor --json api/ts/web-editor/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.typedoc.json --options typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand ../../packages/frontend/web-editor/src

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/shared-sdk && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../docs-md/api/ts/shared-sdk --json ../docs-md/api/ts/shared-sdk/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --exclude **/*.d.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.lib.json --options ../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand src'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/shared-types && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../docs-md/api/ts/shared-types --json ../docs-md/api/ts/shared-types/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --exclude **/*.d.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.lib.json --options ../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand src'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out api/ts/mef-types --json api/ts/mef-types/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --exclude **/node_modules/** --tsconfig tsconfig.typedoc.sanitized.json --options typedoc.base.json --logLevel Warn --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand .tmp/typedoc-sanitized/mef-types

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/model-generator && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../docs-md/api/ts/model-generator --json ../docs-md/api/ts/model-generator/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.lib.json --options ../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand src'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/web-backend && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../docs-md/api/ts/web-backend --json ../docs-md/api/ts/web-backend/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.app.json --options ../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand src'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/microservices/raptor && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs-md/api/ts/raptor --json ../../docs-md/api/ts/raptor/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/*.tsx --exclude **/test/** --tsconfig tsconfig.app.json --options ../../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking --entryPointStrategy expand src'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec sh -c 'cd ../../packages/engine/scram && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs-md/api/ts/scram-node --json ../../docs-md/api/ts/scram-node/typedoc.json --hideBreadcrumbs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --exclude **/*.spec.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.lib.json --options ../../docs-md/typedoc.base.json --skipErrorChecking targets/scram-node/lib/index.d.ts'
mkdir -p packages/docs-md/.tmp/doxygen && doxygen packages/docs-md/tools/Doxyfile.xml && echo 'Doxygen XML generated'

bash -c 'set -e; BIN="$(packages/docs-md/tools/install-doxybook2.sh)" && cd packages/docs-md && mkdir -p api/cpp-doxybook2 && "$BIN" --input .tmp/doxygen/doxygen-xml --output api/cpp-doxybook2 --config tools/doxybook2.json'

pnpm --filter docs-md exec bash -c 'set -Eeuo pipefail; SERVE="${DOCS_LINKCHECK_SERVE:-}"; PORT="${DOCS_LINKCHECK_PORT:-4173}"; BASE="${VITEPRESS_BASE:-}"; CREATED=0; NAME=""; SERVER_PID=""; cleanup() { if [ -n "$SERVER_PID" ]; then kill "$SERVER_PID" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi; if [ "$CREATED" = 1 ] && [ -n "$NAME" ] && [ -L .vitepress/dist/"$NAME" ]; then rm -f .vitepress/dist/"$NAME"; fi; }; trap cleanup EXIT; if [ -n "$BASE" ]; then NAME="${BASE#/}"; NAME="${NAME%/}"; if [ -n "$NAME" ] && [ ! -e .vitepress/dist/"$NAME" ]; then ln -sfn . .vitepress/dist/"$NAME"; CREATED=1; fi; fi; BASE_PATH="/"; if [ -n "$BASE" ]; then TMP="/${BASE#/}"; BASE_PATH="${TMP%/}/"; fi; if [ -n "$SERVE" ] && [ "$SERVE" != "0" ] && [ "$SERVE" != "false" ]; then ENTRY="http://127.0.0.1:${PORT}${BASE_PATH}index.html"; pnpm --filter docs-md preview --port "$PORT" --strictPort --host 127.0.0.1 >/dev/null 2>&1 & SERVER_PID=$!; for i in $(seq 1 50); do if curl -fsS "http://127.0.0.1:${PORT}${BASE_PATH}index.html" >/dev/null 2>&1; then break; fi; sleep 0.2; done; linkinator "$ENTRY" --recurse --silent --skip ".*#.*"; else ENTRIES=(".vitepress/dist/index.html"); if [ -n "${DOCS_LINKCHECK_ENTRIES:-}" ]; then for p in ${DOCS_LINKCHECK_ENTRIES}; do ENTRIES+=(".vitepress/dist/$p"); done; fi; linkinator ${ENTRIES[@]} --recurse --silent --skip ".*#.*|^/.*|^assets/|^vp-icons.css$"; fi'
